name: The hat is close enough
description:
== BANG ==

You are tired of the duels and standoffs. As the gunslinger, you won them all. Nevertheless, they are still trying to bust you up. The only way to get rid of them is to put them close enough to death. That means you have to shoot their hats off so they can run away like little kids. Remember no headshots!

== SCORING ==

HAT: 1 point

HEAD: -2 points

BODY: -1 point

The game is a tribute to Wild Gunmen classic title. 

ESC to quit the game
